Operation 'siteVerification.webResource.getToken' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary entirely. data.current_description: Get a verification token for placing on a website or domain.
data.description_suggestion: Generates a verification token that can be placed on a website or domain to prove ownership to Google. Requires specifying the site identifier and verification method in the request. Returns a verification token string and associated metadata. This token must be placed on the target site before verification can be completed.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks details about required inputs (site identifier, verification method), what the token is used for, and the next steps in the verification workflow. Added context about request requirements, return value, and the relationship to the verification process for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Get the list of your verified websites and domains.
data.summary_suggestion: List all verified websites and domains
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all websites and domains that have been verified for the authenticated user. Returns a collection of site verification resources including verification status, ownership information, and associated metadata for each verified site.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify what data is returned in the response or the structure of the list. Added details about return value structure and what information is included for each verified site to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'siteVerification.webResource.insert' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. data.current_description: Attempt verification of a website or domain.
data.summary_suggestion: Verify ownership of a website or domain
data.description_suggestion: Initiates verification of a website or domain by submitting a verification request with the site identifier and verification method. Requires a valid verification token previously obtained via getToken. On success, returns the verified site resource with ownership confirmation and verification status. The site becomes associated with the authenticated user's account.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is vague about the verification process - doesn't explain required inputs (verification token, site identifier), the relationship to getToken operation, or what happens upon success. Added details about prerequisites, inputs, outputs, and side effects (site association with user account) for clearer AI agent guidance.

message: Operation 'siteVerification.webResource.delete' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. data.current_description: Relinquish ownership of a website or domain.
data.description_suggestion: Removes a verified website or domain from the authenticated user's account, relinquishing ownership claims. Requires the site resource ID as a path parameter. Upon successful deletion, the site is no longer associated with the user's account and verification status is revoked. This action cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks clarity about required input (site ID parameter), what the response contains, and the permanence of the action. Added details about the required parameter, side effects (revocation of verification status), and warning about irreversibility to help AI agents understand the consequences of this operation.

data.current_description: Modify the list of owners for your website or domain. This method supports patch semantics.
data.summary_suggestion: Update site owners using patch semantics
data.description_suggestion: Partially updates the owner list for a verified website or domain using patch semantics. Requires the site resource ID as a path parameter and a request body containing only the fields to be modified. Only provided owner fields are updated; existing owners not specified are preserved. Returns the updated site verification resource with the modified owner list.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description mentions patch semantics but lacks clarity about what can be modified, required inputs, and how partial updates work. Added details about the site ID parameter, patch behavior (only specified fields updated), and return value to improve AI agent understanding of when to use patch vs. update.

data.current_description: Modify the list of owners for your website or domain.
data.summary_suggestion: Replace site owners with full update
data.description_suggestion: Replaces the owner list for a verified website or domain using full update semantics. Requires the site resource ID as a path parameter and a complete request body with the new owner list. All existing owners are replaced with the provided list. Returns the updated site verification resource with the new owner information.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description doesn't clarify the difference from patch (full replacement vs. partial update), required inputs, or return value.
